title: iPhone 15 Pro Max - 256GB - Deep Blue
description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max features a stunning 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology, A17 Pro chip, and a professional camera system with 48MP main camera. Experience the power of Apple's latest flagship smartphone.

title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra - 512GB - Titanium Black
description: The Galaxy S24 Ultra is Samsung's most advanced smartphone yet, featuring a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, and a revolutionary 200MP camera system. Experience the future of mobile technology.

title: MacBook Pro 16-inch - M3 Max - 32GB RAM - 1TB SSD
description: The most powerful MacBook Pro ever is here. Featuring the blazing-fast M3 Max chip, stunning 16-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, and up to 32 hours of battery life. Perfect for professionals and creatives who demand the best.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Experience industry-leading noise cancellation with the Sony WH-1000XM5. These premium wireless headphones feature exceptional sound quality, up to 30 hours of battery life, and advanced AI noise cancellation technology.

title: Amazon Echo Show 10 (3rd Gen) - Smart Display with Alexa
description: The Echo Show 10 features a 10.1-inch HD screen that automatically moves to face you, premium sound, and a 13MP camera for video calls. Control your smart home, watch shows, make video calls, and more with Alexa.

title: LG C3 65-inch 4K OLED Smart TV
description: Experience breathtaking picture quality with the LG C3 OLED TV. Featuring perfect blacks, infinite contrast, and over a billion colors. Powered by the α9 Gen6 AI Processor 4K for stunning picture and sound.

title: Dyson V15 Detect Absolute Cordless Vacuum Cleaner
description: The Dyson V15 Detect features a laser that reveals microscopic dust, an LCD screen that counts and categorizes particles, and powerful suction for deep cleaning. Experience the most intelligent cordless vacuum.

title: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds - Wireless Noise Cancelling
description: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds deliver world-class noise cancellation and immersive sound in a comfortable, secure fit. With up to 6 hours of battery life and touch controls, these earbuds are perfect for all-day listening.

title: Nintendo Switch OLED Model - White
description: The Nintendo Switch OLED Model features a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, 64GB of internal storage, and a wired LAN port in the dock. Play at home on the TV or on-the-go with this versatile gaming system.

title: Philips Hue White and Color Ambiance Starter Kit
description: Transform your home lighting with the Philips Hue Starter Kit. Includes 4 color-changing smart bulbs and a Hue Bridge. Control with your voice, app, or smart home system for millions of colors and scenes.
